page.title: 05FARMING AROUND KINGLASSIE :2
page.content:
Other farm products include -
1.{Turnips}- animal fodder for both sheep and cattle.
2.{Oats}- animal fodder for both sheep and cattle. This year's crop had a high moisture content because of the unusually high summer rainfall. To counter this high moisture level, proponic acid was added - this has the effect of pickling the grain.
3.{Main crop potatoes}- sold on the open market for domestic use.
4.{Oil seed rape}- This is a relatively new crop which has been introduced to the area in the last 4 years. The seeds produce a vegetable oil which is used in the manufacturing of margarine.
